1: -module(hty_json_spaf_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: all() -> [
    5:   {group, format}
    6: ].
    7: 
    8: groups() -> [
    9:   {format, [
   10:     empty_element,
   11:     empty_attribute,
   12:     element_with_text,
   13:     empty_element_with_attributes,
   14:     element_with_text_and_attributes,
   15:     element_with_elements_with_different_names,
   16:     element_with_elements_with_identical_names,
   17:     element_with_elements_and_text%,
   18:     %element_with_attributes_subelements_and_text
   19:   ]}
   20: ].
   21: 
   22: 
   23: % <e/>
   24: empty_element(_Cfg) ->
   25:     do_test([{push,<<"e">>},{pop,<<"e">>}], <<"{\"e\":[]}">>).
   26: 
   27: empty_attribute(_Cfg) ->
   28:     do_test([{push,<<"@e">>},{pop,<<"@e">>}], <<"{\"@e\":null}">>).
   29: 
   30: % <e>t</e>
   31: element_with_text(_Cfg) ->
   32:     do_test(
   33:         [{push,<<"e">>},{text,<<"t">>},{pop,<<"e">>}],
   34:         <<"{\"e\":[\"t\"]}">>
   35:     ).
   36: 
   37: % <e name="value" />
   38: empty_element_with_attributes(_Cfg) ->
   39:     do_test(
   40:         [{push,<<"e">>},{push,<<"@name">>},{text,<<"value">>},{pop,<<"@name">>},{pop,<<"e">>}],
   41:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"@name\":\"value\"}]}">>
   42:     ).
   43: 
   44: %  <e name="value">text</e>
   45: element_with_text_and_attributes(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   46:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   47:          {push,<<"@name">>},
   48:          {text,<<"value">>},
   49:          {pop,<<"@name">>},
   50:          {text,<<"content">>},
   51:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   52:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"@name\":\"value\"},\"content\"]}">>
   53:     ).
   54: % 	push-e,push-a,text-text,pop-a,push-b,text-text,pop-b,pop-b <e> <a>text</a> <b>text</b> </e> 	"e": { "a": "text", "b": "text" }
   55: element_with_elements_with_different_names(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   56:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   57:          {push,<<"a">>},
   58:          {text,<<"t">>},
   59:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   60:          {push,<<"b">>},
   61:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   62:          {pop,<<"b">>},
   63:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   64:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"a\":[\"t\"]},{\"b\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   65:     ).
   66: % 	<e> <a>text</a> <a>text</a> </e>
   67: element_with_elements_with_identical_names(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   68:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   69:          {push,<<"a">>},
   70:          {text,<<"t">>},
   71:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   72:          {push,<<"a">>},
   73:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   74:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   75:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   76:         <<"{\"e\":[{\"a\":[\"t\"]},{\"a\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   77:     ).
   78: 
   79: % 	<e> text <a>text</a> </e>
   80: element_with_elements_and_text(_Cfg) -> do_test(
   81:         [{push,<<"e">>},
   82:          {text,<<"t">>},
   83:          {push,<<"a">>},
   84:          {text,<<"t2">>},
   85:          {pop,<<"a">>},
   86:          {pop,<<"e">>}],
   87:         <<"{\"e\":[\"t\",{\"a\":[\"t2\"]}]}">>
   88:     ).
   89: 
   90: % <project name="apa">
   91: %   <!-- needed? -->
   92: %   <dep name="annan_apa"/>
   93: %   % why?
   94: %   <dep name="tredje_apa"/>
   95: % </project>
   96: element_with_attributes_subelements_and_text(_Cfg) -> y=n.
   97: 
   98: do_test(Evtlist, Expected) ->
   99:     {_, Actual} = lists:foldl(fun(Evt, {State, Outs}) ->
  100:         {ok, State1, Out} = hty_json_spaf:format(Evt, State),
  101:         {State1, [Out|Outs]}
  102:     end, {q0, []}, Evtlist),
  103:     Expected = list_to_binary(lists:reverse(Actual)).
